result.arabic_text: فَٱنظُرۡ إِلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِ رَحۡمَتِ ٱللَّهِ كَيۡفَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَآۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
result.translation: 50. Toysa Yallih racmatih (rob kinnuk) raatitte fan wagit, qabaarah rabte baaxó elle yaynuwwee inna is rabteek gamadal, diggah toh duude Rabbi, rabtem Yaynuwwi kinni, kaadu Usuk ummaan iimil qamalgeytó-li, dudda-li.
